Name: Hard Rock Pinball
About the game: HARD ROCK PINBALL is a game that seeks to bring all the experience of the old pinball machines, to the sound of guitars, drums and synthesizers, in addition to inserting a slot machine to test your luck and bosses that must be defeated. In Hard Rock Pinball, you will find: 3 TYPES OF BALLS: You can choose the type of ball used in the game, with each ball having its own characteristics, giving different playing styles. 3 DIFFERENT TABLES: There are 3 tables available for you to have fun. BOSSES: Each boss in the game has a different type of attack! SLOT MACHINES: Test your luck at the game's slot machines, where you can earn points and credits. What's up? liked? So let's rock!
